summary.purpose: Provides basic math utility functions for use across Akeyless client applications.
summary.problem_solved: Centralizes common arithmetic operations to avoid duplicating simple math logic throughout the codebase.

exports.name: multiply
exports.description_one_line: Multiplies two numbers together and returns the product.

exports.name: add
exports.description_one_line: Adds two numbers together and returns their sum.

exports.name: subtract
exports.description_one_line: Subtracts the second number from the first and returns the difference.

symbols.name: multiply
symbols.description_one_line: Multiplies two numbers together and returns the product.

returns.description: The product of a and b.

details.what_it_does: Accepts two numeric arguments and returns their product using the JavaScript * operator. Pure function with no side effects.

minimal_correct.title: Basic multiplication
minimal_correct.code:
import { multiply } from 'akeyless-client-commons/helpers';

const result = multiply(3, 4); // 12

extensive_correct.title: Using multiply with dynamic values

symbols.name: add
symbols.description_one_line: Adds two numbers together and returns their sum.

returns.description: The sum of a and b.

details.what_it_does: Accepts two numeric arguments and returns their sum using the JavaScript + operator. Pure function with no side effects.

minimal_correct.title: Basic addition
minimal_correct.code:
import { add } from 'akeyless-client-commons/helpers';

const result = add(3, 4); // 7

extensive_correct.title: Using add to accumulate values

symbols.name: subtract
symbols.description_one_line: Subtracts the second number from the first and returns the difference.

returns.description: The difference of a minus b.

details.what_it_does: Accepts two numeric arguments and returns their difference using the JavaScript - operator. Pure function with no side effects.

minimal_correct.title: Basic subtraction
minimal_correct.code:
import { subtract } from 'akeyless-client-commons/helpers';

const result = subtract(10, 4); // 6

extensive_correct.title: Using subtract to calculate a discount
